to learn|to study: to phone| to make phone call
to become| to get/turn(indicating a change in state or condition)
to know(a fact or piece of information)
to look for so/sth | to search sth
to think(opinion about so or sth) | to find sth | to locate so/sth
to taste/try out/sample sth (used to figure out if you like sth or not)
to put/place/lay horizontal (eg phone, book etc)
to taste(to express that something tastes good or bad) - (Dativ verb: Dav + verb+ Nom)
to belong to so/sth | to be owned by so (Dativ verb: Dav + verb+ Nom)
to fit/suit | to match sth(Dativ verb: Dav + verb+ Nom)
to appeal/like good/bad to so| to please me(Dativ verb: Dav + verb+ Nom)
to collect/fetch/pickup so or sth from a place(T-Verb)
to read aloud/to read something to someone(T-Verb)
to step/get out(of sth)/ to back out(T-Verb)
to take so/sth along| to pick so/sth(T-Verb)
to switch/turn/start(start of sports|car|machine or to start a project) sth on(T-Verb)
